resources.string: 1. create dynamic paths and assign it to the robot
Select the path. you can select the path from the drop down. It will list down all the paths robot will able to go.( app send the char value to the server.each value represent the specific path. )
2. give the date and time. Give the date and time value to start the garbage collecting send the data to web server.
3. Get the tasks details from web server. Summries the data on the task list. Delete selected tasks from the list and also web server
4. Set path to get Data from web Server.
